mutants.code:
import re

def extract_unique_words(paragraph):
    words = []
    seen_words = set()
    paragraph = re.sub('', '', paragraph)
    for word in paragraph.split():
        word = word.lower()
        if word not in seen_words:
            seen_words.add(word)
            words.append(word)
    return words

import re

def extract_unique_words(paragraph):
    words = []
    seen_words = set()
    paragraph = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s]', 'MUTATED', paragraph)
    for word in paragraph.split():
        word = word.lower()
        if word not in seen_words:
            seen_words.add(word)
            words.append(word)
    return words

import re

def extract_unique_words(paragraph):
    words = []
    seen_words = set()
    paragraph = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s]', '', paragraph)
    for word in paragraph.split():
        word = word.lower()
        if word in seen_words:
            seen_words.add(word)
            words.append(word)
    return words
